management.title: Document Management Center
management.subtitle: Secure organization of your important documents
management.description: Maintain all your critical paperwork in one secure, organized location for your family's peace of mind.

upload.title: Upload Important Documents
upload.subtitle: Secure your family's access to critical paperwork
upload.dragDrop: Please drag and drop your files here, or click to browse your computer
upload.supportedFormats: Accepted formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, DOCX
upload.multipleFiles: You may upload multiple documents at once
upload.securityNote: All documents are encrypted and securely stored

ai.analyzing: Our system is analyzing your document for important information...
ai.reviewRequired: Please review the extracted information for accuracy
ai.noDataFound: No structured information could be extracted from this document
ai.enhancedSecurity: AI processing maintains document security and privacy

sharing.title: Document Access Control
sharing.description: Manage which family members can access this document
sharing.noAccess: This document is currently private to you

notifications.uploaded: Document has been securely uploaded and processed
notifications.shared: Document access has been granted to {{name}}
notifications.accessRevoked: Document access has been revoked from {{name}}
notifications.reminderSet: Renewal reminder has been set for {{date}}
notifications.restored: Document has been restored from archive
notifications.noteAdded: Family note has been added to this document

errors.uploadFailed: We were unable to upload your document. Please verify the file and try again.
errors.fileTooLarge: This file exceeds our {{size}}MB limit. Please reduce the file size and try again.
errors.unsupportedFormat: This file format is not supported. Please use PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, or DOCX files.
errors.processingFailed: We encountered an issue processing your document. Please try uploading again.
errors.deleteFailed: We could not remove this document. Please try again in a moment.
errors.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access this document
errors.documentNotFound: The requested document could not be located
errors.analysisTimeout: Document analysis is taking longer than expected. Please try again.
errors.downloadFailed: We could not download this document. Please try again.
errors.sharingFailed: We could not share this document. Please verify the recipient and try again.
